name: Ball Toss
description:
Experience all the excitement of throwing a ball and trying to tap it as it flies around your screen. Score more points the faster the ball flies.

Features:

  • Two exciting game modes
  • Multiple ball colors: red, green, and yellow (blue available in Ball Toss Deluxe)
  • Maybe correct translations into four languages
  • Leaderboard with high score action
  • Endless replay value

Toss & Catch Mode: Rack up points when you catch the ball and toss it again and again. But be careful. The game will end if you miss. 

Toss & Chase Mode: Give the ball a good toss and chase it around the screen, tapping it as many times as you can before it comes to a stop.

Blue ball available once the premium version Ball Toss Deluxe is released. (Note: Ball Toss Deluxe does not contain red or green balls.) Like this is the only game that locks a meaningless feature in the free version.
